title: The Point: The Redemption of Oban Ironbout
description: Searching for peace and inspiration, Hollie and Goodwin Macbreeze travel to the Isle of Estillyen - a distant harbor known for bringing ancient words of worth to the present. Their lives become unexpectedly and inseparably intertwined with the reclusive Oban Ironbout - and a mystery from the past that will transform them all.It is a tale of pain ... and redemption.
author: William E. Jefferson
